text: Mahashian Di Hatti Private Limited, doing business as MDH, is an Indian spice producer and seller based in New Delhi, India. It is the second largest leader in the Indian market with 12% market share, following S Narendrakumar's Everest Spices. ==References== Category:1910s establishments in India Category:1919 establishments in Asia Category:Companies of India Category:Food companies Category:New Delhi
title: MDH (spice company)
